Func.name: GetActorValue
Func.desc: Get an actor value. [player.getav luck]

Func.name: SetActorValue
Func.desc: Set an actor value. [player.setav luck, 75]

Func.name: ModActorValue
Func.desc: Modify an actor value. [player.modav luck, -10]

Func.name: PlayGroup
Func.desc: IE: PlayGroup SEQNAME 1

Func.name: IsMoving
Func.desc: Is the actor moving?

Func.name: IsTurning
Func.desc: Is the actor turning?

Func.name: PlaySound
Func.desc: Play a 2D sound. (Optional: 1 to indicate a system sound, 0 otherwise.

Func.name: StartConversation
Func.desc: Start a conversation [Bob.StartConversation Joe, SecretTopic]

Func.name: EnablePlayerControls
Func.desc: 7 optional (0/1) values. movement|pipboy|fighting|pov|looking|rollover|sneaking ex: 1 0 0 1 0 0 0

Func.name: DisablePlayerControls
Func.desc: 7 optional (0/1) values. movement|pipboy|fighting|pov|looking|rollover|sneaking ex: 1 0 0 1 0 0 0

Func.name: GetPlayerControlsDisabled
Func.desc: 7 (0/1) values. movement|pipboy|fighting|pov|looking|rollover|sneaking ex: 1 0 0 1 0 0 0

Func.name: SetSize
Func.desc: Shrink/Grow an actor. [player.shrink 0.0 or radius]

Func.name: SetCellPublicFlag
Func.desc: Set public flag on cell. [setpublic MyCell 1]

Func.name: GetDefaultOpen
Func.desc: Returns 1 if this object is open by default.

Func.name: SetDefaultOpen
Func.desc: A value of 1 will make the object open by default.

Func.name: GetAnimAction
Func.desc: Return the actors current anim action.

Func.name: SetOpenState
Func.desc: A value of 1 will make the object open.

Func.name: SetInChargen
Func.desc: A value of 1 will be in chargen.

Func.name: SetGhost
Func.desc: A value of 1 will make the NPC act as a 'ghost'.

Func.name: GetIsGhost
Func.desc: Returns 1 if the actor is acting as a 'ghost'.

Func.name: SetUnconscious
Func.desc: A value of 1 will be unconscious.

Func.name: GetUnconscious
Func.desc: Returns 1 if is unconscious.

Func.name: SetRestrained
Func.desc: A value of 1 will be restrained.

Func.name: GetRestrained
Func.desc: Returns 1 if is restrained.

Func.name: ForceFlee
Func.desc: Forces a actor to flee if destination or cell is passed in uses them

Func.name: SetWeather
Func.desc: Sets the active weather to the specified type

Func.name: ForceTakeCover
Func.desc: Forces a actor to move away from the target actor for a period of time

Func.name: ForceActorValue
Func.desc: Does modav XXX (value - getav XXX). [player.forceav luck 25]

Func.name: ModPCSkill
Func.desc: Modify the Players Skill. [modpcs Blunt, 10]

Func.name: ModPCAttribute
Func.desc: Modify an actor value. [modpca luck, 10]

Func.name: GetBaseActorValue
Func.desc: Get a base actor value. [player.getbaseav luck]

Func.name: IsOwner
Func.desc: get the ownership of the ref

Func.name: IsCellOwner
Func.desc: get the ownership of the ref

Func.name: ForceWeather
Func.desc: Forces the active weather to the specified type, without transition.

Func.name: IsWaterObject
Func.desc: Water condition used for drinking animation.

Func.name: SetScale
Func.desc: Set the scale of an object

Func.name: ModScale
Func.desc: Modify the scale of an object

Func.name: SetIgnoreFriendlyHits
Func.desc: Set whether an actor should ignore friendly hits (0-no, 1-yes)

Func.name: GetIgnoreFriendlyHits
Func.desc: See if an actor is ignoring friendly hits

Func.name: DamageActorValue
Func.desc: Damage an actor value.

Func.name: RestoreActorValue
Func.desc: Restore an actor value.

Func.name: TriggerHUDShudder
Func.desc: Trigger shudder effect on HUD. Params=Intensity/Duration.

Func.name: SetDisposition
Func.desc: Sets the dispostion with modifiers

Func.name: GetHitLocation
Func.desc: What BGSBodyPart::LIMB_ENUM was hit. -1 = none, 0 = torso, ...

Func.name: IsPC1stPerson
Func.desc: Is the player playing in 1st person mode?

Func.name: PurgeCellBuffers
Func.desc: Forcibly unloads all unattached cells in cell buffers.

Func.name: GetCauseofDeath
Func.desc: What killed the actor

Func.name: IsLimbGone
Func.desc: Is BGSBodyPart::LIMB_ENUM been dismembered

Func.name: IsWeaponInList
Func.desc: Is the current weapon in the form list

Func.name: PlayIdle
Func.desc: Play this idle on the current actor.

Func.name: ApplyImageSpaceModifier
Func.desc: Adds an imagespace modifier to the active list

Func.name: RemoveImageSpaceModifier
Func.desc: Removes an imagespace modifier from the active list

Func.name: ToggleMotionBlur
Func.desc: Toggle Motion Blur for the selected reference

Func.name: SetObjectiveCompleted
Func.desc: Set objective completion status: 0-Off, 1-On

Func.name: SetObjectiveDisplayed
Func.desc: Set objective displayed status: 0-Off, 1-On

Func.name: GetObjectiveCompleted
Func.desc: Get objective completion status: 0-Off, 1-On

Func.name: GetObjectiveDisplayed
Func.desc: Get objective displayed status: 0-Off, 1-On

Func.name: PipboyRadio
Func.desc: Control the Pipboy radio. Enable, Disable, Tune

Func.name: CompleteAllObjectives
Func.desc: Complete all of a quest's objectives

Func.name: DisableNavMesh
Func.desc: Disable navmesh by FormID

Func.name: EnableNavMesh
Func.desc: Enable navmesh by FormID

Func.name: SetNPCRadio
Func.desc: Enable/Disable NPC radio playback: 0-Off, 1-On

Func.name: GetPermanentActorValue
Func.desc: Get an actor value ignoring temporary modifiers. [player.getav luck]

Func.name: GetKillingBlowLimb
Func.desc: Which BGSBodyPart::LIMB_ENUM received the killing blow

Func.name: ShowAllMapMarkers
Func.desc: Shows/hides map markers (1 shows, 0 hides)(1 travel(default), 0 no travel)(1 all, 0 all but hidden(default)).

Func.name: SetRumble
Func.desc: Creates rumble in the controller (left motor) (right motor) (duration)

Func.name: SetNoActivationSound
Func.desc: Set the sound to play when activation fails (Sound)

Func.name: ClearNoActivationSound
Func.desc: Clear the activation failure sound

Func.name: TriggerScreenBlood
Func.desc: Trigger screen blood
